website_summaries.verdict: Not only does this LED projector display a crystal clear and bright picture, but its Bluetooth technology makes streaming from your smartphone, PC, and other devices a snap.
pros: Convenient digital zoom for finding the best picture
Screen share for streaming from other devices
cons: Does not utilize an internal battery

customer_reviews.title: Best projector
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and get going right out of the box!!!! This projector is by far the best projector I have purchased! I have bought many $100 projectors and they are ok but this one I highly recommend. Same price as a cheap tv but much better quality. I will be getting more for each of my rooms and for gifts! I also can’t wait to have friends over to watch the super bowl and fighting events! I’ll include a few pictures that show lights on, Dim lights And dark. Hope this convinces You enough to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great picture for good price
customer_reviews.text: it looks fancy on the outfit. i bought this projector for my home theatre. and i have to say i made the right choice. its easy to use and good quality for the price. it has a very good picture. i have used it to play games and movies. it worked great. and made every night the movie night. awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great image
customer_reviews.text: The wowoto projector is very good. The quality of the image is by far better than I expected and it is a great idea to watch films and tv series specially if you don't own a TV. It is also easy to handle and very small and light, so I can take it everywhere. The sound quality is good but the volume is not enough if you have a big room, anyway you can conect it with a speaker. It's a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: Ines

customer_reviews.title: Great combination of small size and great picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for business, and give a lot of presentations using a projector. I tried out a few, and this was the best one. It is bright enough to show even in a fully lit room, so no need to dim the lights every time I need to show a slide or video. People were impressed and a number of them came up to me afterwards and asked about the projector I was using. It is half the cost of a comparable big name projector. Its small size will make it easy to transport in my carry on bag. I read enough positive reviews of Wowoto that I felt confident enough to trust them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: operationally, the product does not deliver what it says it is capable of.
customer_reviews.text: The picture was clear when it worked. Problem was that it would not allow me to sign into google. the product kept exiting out off the google play app. when it finally downloaded prime for amazon, the movies did not play very clearly. the streaming was choppy and paused alot. last, the unit itself had a short wifi connection capbility. I set up the projector less than 30ft from my wifi router and it could not keep the signal. I also set up the projector in a bedroom less than 10 feet from the wifi router and still had the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G Weaver Jr

customer_reviews.title: LITTLE MONSTER
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this projector, I use a projector in all my evens to project slide shows .. i was looking for something small easy to carry, easy to set up, bright and presentable.. all my equipment is top of the line and this little projector it really makes me look very profesional my clients get surprised when I’m setting up this projector. I looks so small but it’s really bright. I like the carrying case power supply, remote control and hdmi all In this case. If you don’t want to use the remote control. The touch screen on the top it’s so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Djcharliex

customer_reviews.title: Worst Ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst projector ever. Works well if you can ever get it to actually connect. Won't project my Surface via Bluetooth, HDMI, WiFi. I got it to work once on a fluke and never again. We've been trying for months to get it to work to no avail, and now we cannot return it because it's past the return window. If the powers-that-be actually are able to read the review and can generate a return it would be most appreciated. Thank you so much. It is a problem with the machine. Not the company I suspect.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: The picture is clear!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most persons may purchase this projector for home use, however, I am a teacher and wanted a projector for in-class use. It was, therefore, necessary for it to have an excellent resolution for presentations, small for easy carry around, no major technical set up knowledge and of course a great price. I do think that this projector satisfied all of the above for me and have since been recommending it to my colleagues who wish to purchase a projector of that nature. This projector is highly recommended by me for any teacher/educator and it is a smart projector, that is even more exciting...
customer_reviews.author: Intense Technologies

customer_reviews.title: Great image, brightness and contrast
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my purchase. This projector has great image and brightness, very good contrast, vibrant colors and you can use it in rooms with some lighting. There are thousands of APPs available and in my case I found all that I needed. You can mirror the screen of your Smartphone (Apple or Android) without problem, or use the HDMI connection. For this price I recommend the purchase, no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina L. Koniver

customer_reviews.title: Good but Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Good overall I use Microsoft Wireless Display adapter that make things easy to connect, the Office App also makes it easy to use Power Point as well my only concern is it said 3500 Lumen sorry to say is more like 1000 Lumen I put side by side with my Epson 1751 with 2600 Lumen and is half as bright so for that I give it a 4 star. They to be honest and give the correct lumen info and not be deceptive. I will follow with the reliability of it and more on the field performance since I just got it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mirabal

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t received my projector
customer_reviews.text: I liked how compact the projector is. But I bought it December 29th 2019 and for the past 6 months it hasn’t worked! I talked with customer service and they said they would send me a replacement. I sent mine back and still haven’t seen the replacement! Where is my Projector!?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noice!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is fantastic. The quality is excellent with vibrant colors and good brightness. The sleek, compact design is coupled with a very quiet fan and surprisingly good built in speakers, however connecting a separate speaker is highly recommended for max entertainment. I had been researching other projectors for awhile and went with this one because my friends have owned one for around a year and it still works like the day they got it. The android system is outdated, but handy nonetheless. Only con was that mine didn’t come with an AV cable, however that’s no biggie for me. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an 3d projector for quite some time. After review of several videos and the reading of numerous reviews, I decided to choose the Wowoto H8 smart 3d projector. This projector is everything that I have been looking for. It exceeds my expectations. The picture is clear, the sound is good. I have not yet tried the 3d but I will up date this review at a later date. It does have the ability to down load some apps such as Netflix, Hulu, Disney ect. However, I was eager to see how the fire stick will work and needless to say, thumbs up👍
customer_reviews.author: cinde. mabry

customer_reviews.title: Perfection on all aspects with affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This my first time of writing a review but if you are like me you will be really puzzled by how many projectors out there. I had to try almost 10 to get to this one which combines portability, wifi and blue tooth connection(so need to by extra streaming devices as it has its own apps and OS) very light weight and fantastic brightness and 4K pictures quality that only the Biggers ones can offer You will never go wrong with this one I attached pics in slightly dim room, dark room and a video in 4K. Quality speaks for it self
customer_reviews.author: omarkhattab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mini Projector.
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a small projector however this thing has a built in smart system as well. Easy to download apps or surf the web. I use it for training courses and work related items however will be buying one for my personally use as well. Great image.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great projector but the remote is junk!
customer_reviews.text: This would have gotten a five star but the remote for this just sucks! We love watching this but to get it to do what you want is sometimes impossible. You have to keep shutting it down and start all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy poor projector.
customer_reviews.text: Had several issues with this projector. Could not connect Bluetooth devices. Could not open several of the preinstalled apps, YouTube etc. Projector would not shut down completely when tried to shut down. Called for support with amazon, who couldn’t help and who said WOWOTO would get in touch which they never did.
customer_reviews.author: RP Jr

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gawd, NO WAY!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we buy one of these projectors. The first was the H8. We were so happy with the first one with the picture quality and everything that we decided to go for this one. I love how easy and customizable the screen is. You can actually shape the picture to whatever screen you may have. It’s also great for games. The remote was a bit of pain when it comes to putting batteries in it. Since you have to pry it open. (Kinda scary when you’re trying not to break something you just bought) But overall it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Android software is outdated and won't update
customer_reviews.text: This projector was a revelation last year. It is fantastically powerful for such a small package. It was great to have a "smart" device too where you didn't even need a computer but 1.5 years later the android OS will not update on it and now I need to have a computer or other device attached to enjoy programming. I was hoping to enjoy Disney + and other apps on the go without the computer or other device. Still good for work but not great anymore for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L

customer_reviews.title: Nice Video and picture quality. I will recommend to anyone who look for a compact projector.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. Its so compact and it works well with my macbook air 2018 13 inch, and lenovo laptop with HDMI ports. This projector supports well with my Sony DVD player. video quality is good. Projector sound is good for a small room but we can add external speakers. Overall i will recommend this product anyone who are looking for a compact projector. I purchased this projector Second time for my brother-in-law. He liked this projector very much after watched a movie in this projector.
customer_reviews.author: ARS

customer_reviews.title: Very compact projector
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, lightweight, quality picture, intuitive controls. Use this projector to do business presentations, works great with Epson ES1000 portable screen. Almost any room becomes a very good meeting room in nearly an instant. This is a high quality projector at an affordable price, highly recommend, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Some good things DO come in small packages.. This WOWOTO projector rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptical when ordering this projector as I was not sure how something this small could deliver on quality. Let me tell you - all my doubts were removed as soon as I turned the projector on. It is at par with any good quality WXGA projector I have used that cost many times more then this one. I primarily will be using this for powerpoint presentations and I am completely satisfied with the results this projector gives.
customer_reviews.author: Wajih Arif

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for how small this thing I I thought it would be decent in a pitch black room, I only needed it for my bedroom when going to sleep. But this thing is solid, the quality is way better than anticipated and its much brighter than I expected. I actually have to dim it when in my room, really solid projector. I got plex installed and running on it really fast and use it everyday, totally worth.
customer_reviews.author: EMHuskey

customer_reviews.title: Packed with Features
customer_reviews.text: The projector was easy to set up. Although bigger than other mini projectors, this projector is still relatively small and lightweight. It's packed with features that give you lots of options for use. It's bright enough that you can see the picture pretty well with the lights on, but it's even better in a dark room. The kickstand has a high and low setting, but it seems a bit flimsy at the higher setting. The remote is also slightly sensitive and occasionally types numbers or letters multiple times when you hit the keys. That being said, you're still getting a great deal for the price. At this time, I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JMar

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Projector
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use right out of the box. Digital prompts walk you through setup. Descriptions are accurate regarding size, weight, and brightness. Seems like a great solution for our outdoor/evening movie nights. Picture quality is good; as is the refresh rate. Only area I’m still exploring is the ability to sync with a Bluetooth/portable speaker AND stream video through our network. There appears to be an audio/video conflict using this method that doesn’t exist if you feed video via HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We bought this projector based on its great customers review on amazon. After we received it, we tried it immediately. I am very impressive about this product. Very easy to set up; Compact size; Good picture quality; Can connect to PC through HDMI cable or cast youtube video wirelessly directly from my iPhone. My family is very satisfied with this projector. Great for family time movie or slides presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after buying a different mini projector. The mini projector was good, however the light was too dim. So I found this projector on amazon and thought I'd give it a shot. I'm glad I did! It is excellent! The brightness is great since some movies I watch have dark scenes. Also, I love that fact that this comes with a remote so I don't have to press buttons on the projector. The speakers are decent, although I have a soundbar that I sync with bluetooth. Great product! A+
customer_reviews.author: Rdkrazy

customer_reviews.title: Bright lil jector
customer_reviews.text: This is a dope little projector. When compared to my old BenQ projector, it's just as bright if not a bit brighter. And the throw is way better. I'll admit I goofed because I didn't realize portable doesn't nessecarily mean battery powered haha. But that's on me. So I just bought an external battery when and AC outlet and it was able to run the projector for 2 hours! But yea the image quality rocks. Some of the apps aren't fully functional, but it was still worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: Small, bright, and portable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in my living room as a tv replacement and I love it. The picture will get washed out if the front door is wide open and all the curtains open, but I live in Arizona where it is hot outside so the door stays shut, curtains closed. I will never buy another tv. I use a Bluetooth speaker and it works great for me and my family.
customer_reviews.author: Steph D

customer_reviews.title: Good image quality
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive, the image quality is worth the price but sound is not. So we decided to buy a TV instead
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased so far with this projector purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little projector! We haven’t had a chance to use it outdoors yet due to rain but we have used it inside and very pleased with picture quality. Comes in a nice box with padding. Super easy set up right out the box. It will be perfect to travel with. The only suggestion I have it definitely have or get a Bluetooth speaker to go with it because the built in speaker is like a whisper with the volume on max, which I didn’t expect to be very loud anyways. Our Sony speaker paired to it no problems. I’ll update when we take it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Langa

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing picture
customer_reviews.text: I was using aaxa pico projector for the last three years have so many problems with it so I decided to get a new one. I looked up to see what is new and I found so many reviews on YouTube about this projector. So I decided to give it try. The projector is amazing the picture and video quality are astonishing. The must thing I loved about this projector is the IMirror. I used it with my IPhone and Ipad and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nabeel

customer_reviews.title: Erratic sound and picture
customer_reviews.text: Speaker and aux, positively suck. Bt is far better, but WILL disconnect several times over an evening. You have to turn speaker off, then on. It will also revert to chrome cast cover screen periodically, and have to hit cursor key to display stream. Very annoying. Great picture and text readability tho..
customer_reviews.author: The Ecliptic

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and useful mini projector
customer_reviews.text: I just received my mini projector today! It is quite small and very easy to use. Just turned it on and the picture quality was very good even at the day light. I wasn’t expecting this clear view during the day light environment. I am not a tech person but I think I made a good decision. I compared a lot of different models and brands on internet and found this mini projector as the best compared to its price. I am also planning to use this at my work because it is very light and easy to carry with you. It is not noisy while it is running.
customer_reviews.author: Pinar Suren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect wireless using the UShare app
customer_reviews.text: We really like the size and performance of this projector, the UShare app that helps connecting wirelessly with the laptops, so everyone participating in the meeting/class can share their screen using the projector is a plus. So far the quality and performance of the projector is good. The only drawback is that doesn't have a rechargeable battery so it needs to be plugged the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fantastic projector
customer_reviews.text: This is the best projector I have ever purchased. Very reliable and easy to use, super compact. I never heard of “Wowoto” before but they did an excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: Coloradofamily

customer_reviews.title: Great thing, small package
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Projector, great picture quality. Sound is great for indoors however the Bluetooth feature does not allow you to pair multiple devices at the same time. Also, setting up UShare was confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted! I'm so excited
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase for a projector. The first one did not have WiFi capabilities. I wanted this to play YouTube videos with lyrics for our monthly bible study. This was so on point with what I was looking for. The picture is crisp and clear. So worth the money. I just finished ordering the screen and case for this mini projector. Don't let it's size fool you. It is great and gets the job done. I was able to mirror my Samsung Edge7 as well which was a plus :)
customer_reviews.author: J.D

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It! Make the Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: The best projector I've bought, small, super quiet, great clear picture and great price! Would I buy again, Without a Doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The volume is great for this device but you will most likely use a speaker with your projector when doing a movie night. The color and picture is amazing and it having wifi is an added plus because that puts everything at your fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent image quality!
customer_reviews.text: Well... First thing first... The projector was delivered in a timely manner. It arrived before the estimated delivery date. It is very well packaged... Simple to set up and use... And over the top, what really caught me was the image quality... Simply impressive! Money very well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Phlip

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: The screen quality is perfect. It was a surprise. For a home theater, the sound setting is quite satisfactory. For me, it's perfect in every way. 1 disadvantage. The remote control. Should have build it a little touch pad or mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Zolee

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best/first ever projector I’ve ever seen the picture quality is excellent, the sound is great for like a small space or room and you’ll need to connect it to a speaker, I got this projector mainly for the 3D affect now I haven’t tried that out I’m waiting for my glasses in the mean time this is by far so good
customer_reviews.author: Aqua

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Projetor
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the size of this projector fool you. It worked terrific as a rear projector on a 16 foot screen at dusk. The image was not visible in direct sunlight, but as soon as the sun went down, this projector did a terrific job. For the price and the size, I could not be more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJo Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that it does not have an internal battery but it is not advertised as having one so no star reduction. Very small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O.

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is great, remote is awful, won’t boot to the home screen.
customer_reviews.text: The remote is old tech. Our older projector has a much smarter remote. Also it won’t start sometimes. It plays the beginning sequence animation over and over again. I have to physically unplug it and re plug it in 3-4 times every time.
customer_reviews.author: David Balian

customer_reviews.title: No Issues
customer_reviews.text: This is my first projector and I was instantly impressed but the ease of setup with this device. The interface is very similar to other modern technology. I had no trouble hooking up to my WIFI, laptop, and streaming video services. Physically, the projector is very small and will be great for travel and utilizing in multiple rooms of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value, great size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent image quality even under high light conditions, only issue is having some problems with wi-fi connectivity. Works excellently with hdmi. Still working out kinks but bluetooth is working well, just need to figure out how to get Chrome working. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin d. duval

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second project I have owned, and it is awesome so far. After many research I did this to be the best portable projector at its price range. Others are native 480p at its size and price, this product offers super crisp pictures and very simple to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kyeongbin Lim

customer_reviews.title: Overall the price for the projector and the image is very good.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is ok but you can't update to a better android version. Youtube will not work with current version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charger Adapter 5V 10W
customer_reviews.text: This is a USB 2.0 and micro USB flat cord connection, secure at both ends with a sturdy wall plug. Compatible with my HP Touchpad and charges in the same time frame as the original charger (which ceased to charge after one year plus of use, possibly related to the USB connection itself?) Anyway, I chose to purchase the entire setup, and am pleased with the product and price.
customer_reviews.author: interpath

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful
customer_reviews.text: This was a real deal for the size and cost. It worked better than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed. Great design and outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got the WOWOTO projector so we can watch movies outside in our backyard. Was very impressed. We opened it right away and in no time at all we were up and running. Great projector for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Freaner

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great, Software compatibility... Not so much
customer_reviews.text: The projector's picture quality is great. However the ability to stream from WiFi is poor. Also, very limited with what apps actually function or function correctly. The Bluetooth function is also poor.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and the power cord was bent/broken. I couldn't figure out how to hook up by Bluetooth either. Returning and getting an Epson
customer_reviews.author: Steven Temes

customer_reviews.title: I strongly recommend NOT to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It broke down 4 days after using it, I am so disappointed, it worked well at the beginning, but looks like the made is from poor material, and I had to return it back any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup. Apps+Wifi makes it a mini Smart TV
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Work for the HP TouchPad
customer_reviews.text: My parents gave me their TouchPad (which I rooted and put Android on, AWESOME btw) but the kids lost the charger. I haven't been able to charge this with any other adapter. This one does the trick beautifully. The Micros USB cable that comes with it is nice and hefty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 9 (yes, it's a little crazy around here)

customer_reviews.title: Is very good beautiful color and image is great.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that In the Specification says ROM: 16GB and the real item is 8GB. Come on say the truth. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for those high amp devices.
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these with my touchpad (one each for direct connection and one for the touchstone charger/base) and managed to misplace one. I soon realized that moving one between rooms, remembering to take it when traveling, etc. was not worth the hassle, given these are so inexpensive. I bought two more, and now I have them for the office, bedroom and my travel bag, and don't have to cope with moving them all the time. Should work with any tablet such as iPad, Nexus, Asus, Samsung, etc. that require 1.5+ amp-hour current flows.
customer_reviews.author: Migepsi

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Using this instead of a TV at home. Great at night (with Bluetooth speakers). Not much use during the day unless you block out the light. Overall, good vfm.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful... Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This camera came in a tiny package, but put out a fantastic picture. Wonderful buy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Davidson

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Everything is super! I really liked the quality of the work of this projector. The screen is bright, juicy color, very low fan noise, convenient settings, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: us5lvg

customer_reviews.title: Good for the ceiling projector in the night
customer_reviews.text: I am using that one for the ceiling projector Good quality for that. But weak in day time.
customer_reviews.author: Hyunsoo7

customer_reviews.title: happy with this projector
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, easy to use and responsive. Good quality and powerful light for the size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Branaa

customer_reviews.title: Great price - Great results
customer_reviews.text: The HP Touchpad charger has been the only downfall to the quality and enjoyment of the Touchpad. The one that came with the product never really worked correctly and I've had the dickens of a time finding it on the internet. You can't buy a replacement in stores since the product has been discontinued. This one works flawlessly and was guaranteed to do so. The price was a little more than previous ones that I've bought but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SL Childs

customer_reviews.title: Worth for money!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great.. Speaker and remote could have been better..but not a major concern..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but a bit persnicketty
customer_reviews.text: The fan is a bit unstable. I had to jiggle it a bit to get it working again. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Berger

customer_reviews.title: Very good for this price
customer_reviews.text: Very good but I don't found 3 in 1 cable in the box and I can't test 3d because there is no glasses free with there
customer_reviews.author: emad eldin amin

customer_reviews.title: Must BUY Projector
customer_reviews.text: Amazing projector!!! I would recommend to buy this projector for sure..
customer_reviews.author: Atmankumar

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. Tried it out on the wall. Picture quality and brightness is good. Built in speakers are good too.
customer_reviews.author: Newton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works for the HP Touchpad!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for the hp touchpad, charge originally got lost, so I needed this replacement, glad it works! I caught this on sale so was worth it, glad it worked!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good portable projector with 19 volt power supply.
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution at 10 feet. Very good build quality. Very little space on the internal memory.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: good projector
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for past 3 days and the picture clarity is good
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Anthony A

customer_reviews.title: Cannot adjust the picture to rectangle
customer_reviews.text: There are no hardware or software controls to adjust the picture to rectangle.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Kumar Addanki

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: wonderful i love this item it works great no problem at all it is exactly what i wanted and it cam on time as they said.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this adapter. Charges faster than the original cord that came with the tablet. Hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: bobmarley

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. Extremely disappointed in this product. Design is clever but the image is dreadful.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: A + rating
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it is suppose to for replacement charger. It shipped quickly and is recognized by hp touch pad as original equipment.
customer_reviews.author: AJPHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Just the Right Part
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the charger unit for an HP tablet that was given to us, sans charger. This works just right to charge up the battery without any issues. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy because of some of the negative comments but its works great even works on my samsung galaxy
customer_reviews.author: JARED J LEBLANC

customer_reviews.title: Just bought 4 months ago and not reliable
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the product seems below the expectation on such a price listed by Amazon. Just 4 months, the product is stuck with booting problem. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: pua c.

product_meta.title: WOWOTO H8 3500 lumens Mini Projector LED DLP 1280x800 Real Mini Home Theater Projector WXGA Support 3D 1080P HD Perfect for Entertainment Business Wireless Screen Share Android HDMI USBx2 RJ45
product_meta.description: Color:Black-H8Specification OS: Android 4. 4 (WIFI 2. 4G&5G/Bluetooth 4. 0) Speaker: Built-in Projector technology : DLP Resolution: 1280*800 (supports 1080p and 3D) Brightness: 3500 Lumens (works best at night) Multi-screen Sharing: Airplay/Miracast/DLNA/Share Contrast Ratio: 2000: 1 Aspect Ratio: 16: 10, 16: 9, 4: 3 RAM: 1GB ROM: 8GB USB Format: Maximum of 32GB FAT16 (read and write) FAT32(read and write) NTFS(read only) Keystone Correction: 40°Vertical Keystone AUTO/Manual Projection Size: 20”- 300” (the best projection distance is 2m-3m. ) Light: RGB LED Input port: HDMI/AV/USB2. 0*1/USB3. 0*1/ Micro SD/RJ45/ Output port: Headset Jack Projection Methods: Front / Rear / Ceiling Weight: 0. 5kg Size: 153*120*31mm Additional: Kickstand What’s in the box? WOWOTO H8 Projector*1 Remote*1 Adapter*1 AC Cable*1 HDMI Cable*1Quick User Manual*1 What will you get after purchase? Professional after-sales service Reliable service Reasonable usage suggestion Thanks for using our 3D DLP smart projectors! Share the happiness with your whole family right now!
feature_bullets: ★Advanced Configuration★ 1280*800 native resolution (WXGA), 3500 Lumens, Android OS, DLP technology, LED Lamp. Amazing 3D effect, supports 1080P input. Built-in WiFi/Bluetooth/Speaker/Touch Control. Extensive Stable Wired Connection: HDMI*1, AV*1, USB2.0*1, USB3.0*1, Mirco SD*1, RJ45*1 ★

★Best Choice of Projector★ You can download and install apps you like and play it on the huge projection screen (up to 300”) Also can connect external speaker to enjoy music! Rich color and HD resolution provide the great visual feast. ★★★Update: The batteries for remote control won't be included in the package, because we're informed that shipping AAA batteries is dangerous. Please buy the AAA batteries separately. Thanks for your understanding. ★★★

★Wireless Screen Share★ Smartphone resources can be shared through the huge screen by Airplay/Miracast/DLNA/Ushare. Project from your laptop, tablet, or smartphone without plugging into the projector, so you can move freely about the room, your business life will be convenient and professional.

★Compact Stylish Design★ Popular matte black brings stylish body. First Choice of Christmas gift. No larger than an iPad mini, lightweight only 0.5kg. Easy to set up and enjoy with whole family right away! Touch Control is displayed on the top. Connect wired/wireless mouse to USB port or Bluetooth. When not in use, won’t take up much space.

★Long-lasting LED★ 45,000 hours Long-lasting LED lamp does not have to be replaced for a long time even if the projector is used 3 hours every day. Please note that the H Series Model need to be plugged in for use.
